LANDING.TITLE: Welcome to SoundSphere
LANDING.SUBTITLE: Your personal music sanctuary. Upload, organize, and enjoy your music collection with our intuitive interface.

AUDIO_PLAYER.TITLE: Audio Player
AUDIO_PLAYER.DESCRIPTION: High-quality audio playback with intuitive controls

SONG_LIST.TITLE: Song List
SONG_LIST.DESCRIPTION: Organize and browse your music collection effortlessly

UPLOAD_SONGS.TITLE: Upload Songs
UPLOAD_SONGS.DESCRIPTION: Easily upload and expand your music library

TEAM.TITLE: Team
TEAM.DESCRIPTION: Meet the passionate developers behind SoundSphere

ANTEK.NAME: Antoni Piwowarski
ANTEK.DESCRIPTION: Passionate about creating intuitive and powerful music experiences.

KUBA.NAME: Jakub Kuźnicki
KUBA.DESCRIPTION: Creating beautiful and functional interfaces for the best user experience.

DAWID.NAME: Dawid Mańkowski
DAWID.DESCRIPTION: Ensuring our platform runs smoothly and securely for all users.

ABOUT_PROJECT.TITLE: About Our Project
ABOUT_PROJECT.PARAGRAPH1: Music App is a school project created by a team of music enthusiasts and student developers. Our goal is to provide a seamless and enjoyable music listening experience while giving users complete control over their music library.
ABOUT_PROJECT.PARAGRAPH2: This project showcases our team's skills in web development, user interface design, and backend implementation. We've worked together to create a platform that demonstrates our understanding of modern web technologies and user-centered design principles.

INFORMATION_USE.TITLE: 2. How We Use Your Information
ITEMS: Communicate with you about your account

INFORMATION_SHARING.TITLE: 3. Information Sharing
INFORMATION_SHARING.DESCRIPTION: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with:
ITEMS: Service providers helping operate our platform
Law enforcement when required by law

DATA_SECURITY.TITLE: 4. Data Security
DATA_SECURITY.DESCRIPTION: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information. However, as this is a student project, we cannot guarantee absolute security.

CONTACT.TITLE: 6. Contact Us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: For any privacy-related questions, please contact us at privacy@soundsphere.edu

INTRODUCTION.TITLE: 1. Introduction
INTRODUCTION.CONTENT: Welcome to SoundSphere. By accessing our service, you agree to these terms. SoundSphere is an educational project created by students.

SERVICE_DESCRIPTION.TITLE: 2. Service Description
SERVICE_DESCRIPTION.CONTENT: SoundSphere is a music streaming platform designed for educational purposes. We provide users with the ability to stream music, create playlists, and manage their music library.

USER_ACCOUNTS.TITLE: 3. User Accounts
USER_ACCOUNTS.CONTENT: Users must register to access SoundSphere's features. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.

ACCEPTABLE_USE.TITLE: 4. Acceptable Use
RULES: Use the service for personal, non-commercial purposes
Not attempt to circumvent any service restrictions

CONTENT_GUIDELINES.TITLE: 5. Content Guidelines
CONTENT_GUIDELINES.CONTENT: Users must not upload or share:

LIABILITY.TITLE: 6. Limitation of Liability
LIABILITY.CONTENT: SoundSphere is a student project and is provided "as is" without any warranties. We are not liable for any damages arising from your use of the service.

ROOM.TITLE: Music Room

ERROR.COPY_FAILED: Failed to copy room ID. Please try manually copying it.

ROOM.LEAVE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to leave the room? You will need to rejoin.

ERROR.TOO_SHORT: Username must be at least 3 characters long
ERROR.INVALID_CHARS: Username can only contain letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens

ERROR.FAILED: Failed to update profile. Please try again later.

PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS.TITLE: Password requirements:
PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS.HAS_NUMBER: Must contain at least one number
PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS.HAS_LETTER: Must contain at least one letter
